TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @electronic{leferrand2024ntu, author = {Le Ferrand, {'E}ric and Prud'hommeaux, Emily and Hartshorne, Joshua K. and Sung, Li-May}, year = {2024}, title = {{NTU} {Paiwan} {ASR} Corpus},type = {Electronic Resource}}

S.FORM: azua sika makaya a izua a patjetucu a kai, a kakudakudan, a palisi na paiwan zuku, mavan a izua pinui'inainaljan mavan a izua pinui'inaljanan a sinan kakudan tua 'iniladjan.
azoa sika makaya a izoa a patjetoco a kai, a kakodakodan, a palisi na paiwan zoko, mavan a izoa pinoi'inainaljan mavan a izoa pinoi'inaljanan a sinan kakodan toa 'iniladjan.
'aw aicu a pinui'inaljanan a sinan kakudan tua 'inila'iladjan, kemasimaza taicu a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vusam a kakudakudan.
'aw aico a pinoi'inaljanan a sinan kakodan toa 'inila'iladjan, kemasimaza taico a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vosam a kakodakodan.
aicu a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vusam a kakudakudan namayatucu, a na tja-sevalitan a 'iniladjan kata zaisang, sawzayan, mavan a sangasangasan a aljak a tjemalevak aya,
aico a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vosam a kakodakodan namayatoco, a na tja-sevalitan a 'iniladjan kata zaisang, sawzayan, mavan a sangasangasan a aljak a tjemalevak aya,
ipu u'aljay ipu vavayan, kana sangasangasan a sinipualjak, timadju a tjemalevak a penuljat tua zaisang, sawzayan, ngadan nua uma' kata 'iniladjan i 'inaljan.
ipo o'aljay ipo vavayan, kana sangasangasan a sinipoaljak, timadjo a tjemalevak a penoljat toa zaisang, sawzayan, ngadan noa oma' kata 'iniladjan i 'inaljan.
makeljang angata tu aicu a paiwan zuku mamamav a sipacunan tua vavayavayan katua u'alja'aljay, manasika tjuruvuanga a vavayavayan a vusam a na'emiladj i 'inaljan tucu,
makeljang angata to aico a paiwan zoko mamamav a sipaconan toa vavayavayan katoa o'alja'aljay, manasika tjorovoanga a vavayavayan a vosam a na'emiladj i 'inaljan toco,
makeljang angata tu mamav a sipacunan tua vavayavayan katua u'alja'aljay na paiwan zuku, aicu mavana sikizengezenger nua paiwan zuku a cawcau uta.
makeljang angata to mamav a sipaconan toa vavayavayan katoa o'alja'aljay na paiwan zoko, aico mavana sikizengezenger noa paiwan zoko a cawcao ota.
aicu a seravar namaya paiwan zuku uta, ljakua maljiyan a kakudan niamadju, aicu a seravar semanvusam tua u'aljay, nu neka nu u'aljay a aljak, mana seman vusam ta vavayan a aljak.
aico a seravar namaya paiwan zoko ota, ljakoa maljiyan a kakodan niamadjo, aico a seravar semanvosam toa o'aljay, no neka no o'aljay a aljak, mana seman vosam ta vavayan a aljak.
aicu a nasi na u'aljay kata vavayan tjara izua a patarevan, aicu a sikamamav nua u'aljay nua vavayan a paljavak tua ikacauan a kinemeneman, a kininemeneman, kinasicuay nua paiwan zuku.
aico a nasi na o'aljay kata vavayan tjara izoa a patarevan, aico a sikamamav noa o'aljay noa vavayan a paljavak toa ikacaoan a kinemeneman, a kininemeneman, kinasicoay noa paiwan zoko.

kemasi tua sialangan tua nemanga, maljaluay aza sisan pazangalan ta u'aljay ta vavayan a langalj, katua vecik na djilung, na tjiuma, na kamavanan. kana sinicuayan a vecik izua sakamaya a pa'ecev pa'a'ecev tua vavayan tua u'aljay. kemasi tua sialangan tua nemanga, maljaluay aza sisan pazangalan ta u'aljay ta vavayan a langalj, katua vecik na djilung, na tjiuma, na kamavanan. kana sinicuayan a vecik izua sakamaya a pa'ecev pa'a'ecev tua vavayan tua u'aljay.

kemasi toa sialangan toa nemanga, maljaloay aza sisan pazangalan ta o'aljay ta vavayan a langalj, katoa vecik na djilong, na tjioma, na kamavanan. kana sinicoayan a vecik izoa sakamaya a pa'ecev pa'a'ecev toa vavayan toa o'aljay. kemasi toa sialangan toa nemanga, maljaloay aza sisan pazangalan ta o'aljay ta vavayan a langalj, katoa vecik na djilong, na tjioma, na kamavanan. kana sinicoayan a vecik izoa sakamaya a pa'ecev pa'a'ecev toa vavayan toa o'aljay.
a kininemeneman nua paiwan zuku inika amin a 'emuzimuzip na izua u'aljay a vavayan,
a kininemeneman noa paiwan zoko inika amin a 'emozimozip na izoa o'aljay a vavayan,
aicu a i cemecemel a namezangal tu nemanga izua namasan u'aljay namasan vavayan,
aico a i cemecemel a namezangal to nemanga izoa namasan o'aljay namasan vavayan,
naseminamalji a pa'ulid a puvarungan nua sevalitan na paiwan zuku, mapu'ataitjen a kizenger a mapu'ataitjen a kizenger a mapuljat a paiwan zuku a cawcau,
naseminamalji a pa'olid a povarongan noa sevalitan na paiwan zoko, mapo'ataitjen a kizenger a mapo'ataitjen a kizenger a mapoljat a paiwan zoko a cawcao,
satje sanpazangali aicu a tjaljapenapamavan a kakudakudan i tua tja 'inaljan.
satje sanpazangali aico a tjaljapenapamavan a kakodakodan i toa tja 'inaljan.
